trans-unit.note: Heading for an button used to scan a barcode on a package or label

trans-unit.target: Choisissez ce qui correspond le mieux
trans-unit.note: Heading for a list of suggested deliveries to add, based on the input
Heading for a list of existing deliveries that can be edited

trans-unit.source: Passwords are saved securely in the keychain.
trans-unit.target: Les mots de passe sont sauvegardés en toute sécurité dans votre trousseau.
trans-unit.note: Footer text that appears below settings that include a password field

trans-unit.source: A placeholder is a way to manually keep track of deliveries from services we don’t support directly. Enter as much information as you like as a reminder to check on this package later.
trans-unit.target: Un paramètre fictif est une façon de suivre manuellement les livraisons de services que nous ne prenons pas en charge directement. Saisissez autant d’informations que vous voulez comme rappel pour vérifier ce colis plus tard.
trans-unit.note: Footer text that appears below settings for a placeholder delivery
Title for a view used to edit a delivery
Title for a view used to edit a delivery. 'Edit Delivery: {delivery name}, for example 'Edit Delivery: Running Shoes' or 'Edit Delivery: 1Z1234567890'

trans-unit.source: Learn more ways to add deliveries
trans-unit.target: Apprendre d’autre façons d’ajouter des livraisons
trans-unit.note: Button that shows helpful information about additional ways to add new deliveries
Heading for a list of web site that deliveries can be imported from

trans-unit.source: Enter a tracking number, web address, shipping company, or other information
trans-unit.target: Saisissez un numéro de suivi, une adresse web, une entreprise d’expédition ou toute autre information
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text briefly explaining what types of information can be entered in the Add Delivery text field
Heading for a button used to manually add a delivery
Heading for a button used to add multiple deliveries at once
Heading for a section where multiple deliveries can be selected to add
Title for a view used to add multiple deliveries at once
Heading for a button used to create a placeholder delivery
Button to open a camera view for scanning barcodes
Heading for a list of delivery services to choose from that match the input
Heading for a list of all available shipping services
Button to show all available shipping services
Heading for a list of shipping services that are most likely to match the tracking number: Best guesses for {tracking number}, for example 'Best guesses for ABC12345678'
Message shown when no matching shipping services were found
Heading for a list of only the most used shipping services
Button to show only the most used shipping services
Title for a view used to add a new delivery

trans-unit.source: Please visit the site to check for a new version. If a newer version is not available, in most cases you can safely delete the beta version and download the latest version from the Mac App Store.
trans-unit.target: Veuillez visiter le site pour vérifier s’il existe une nouvelle version. Si aucune nouvelle version n’est disponible, vous pouvez, dans la plupart des cas, supprimer la version bêta en toute sécurité et télécharger la dernière version depuis le Mac App Store.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the beta is expired
Title for an alert shown when the beta has expired
Button to turn off the torch (flashlight), used by VoiceOver
Button to turn on the torch (flashlight), used by VoiceOver

trans-unit.source: Open the Settings app and make sure Camera access is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Ouvrez les réglages et assurez-vous que l’accès à l’appareil photo est autorisé.
trans-unit.note: Message shown whem the camera is not available, explaning how to fix the problem

trans-unit.source: The camera is not available when more than one app is open
trans-unit.target: L’appareil photo n’est pas disponible quand plusieurs applications sont ouvertes
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that the camera is not available because multiple apps are open
Title for a message shown then the camera is not available
Button to add a shared delivery

trans-unit.source: It looks like you have a tracking number on your clipboard. Tap to add it.
trans-unit.target: Il semble que vous ayez un numéro de suivi dans votre presse-papiers. Appuyez pour l’ajouter.
trans-unit.note: Message for a popup alert when a tracking number is detected on the clipboard
Title for a popup alert when a tracking number is detected on the clipboard: {shipping company name} delivery detected, for example 'UPS delivery detected'

trans-unit.source: It looks like you have an older version of the app installed. You may run into problems if you keep both versions. To delete the older version, click the Reveal button below, then drag the icon to the Trash.
trans-unit.target: Il semblerait qu’une ancienne version de l’application soit installée sur votre appareil. En gardant les deux versions, vous risquez de rencontrer des problèmes. Afin de supprimer l’ancienne version, cliquez sur le bouton Révéler ci-dessous, puis faites glisser l’icône vers la corbeille.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that a duplicate copy of the app was detected

trans-unit.source: The duplicate app is no longer installed.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that a duplicate copy of the app has been removed
Title for an alert explaining that a duplicate copy of the app has been removed
Title for an alert explaining that a duplicate copy of the app was detected

trans-unit.source: You do not have any deliveries
trans-unit.note: Message shown in an empty view when there are no deliveries

trans-unit.source: You don’t have any upcoming deliveries.
trans-unit.target: Vous n’avez aucune livraison à venir.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in an empty view when there are no upcoming deliveries
Button to export all deliveries

trans-unit.source: Let us know if you continue to have problems. You can reset service updates by opening the Settings, tapping Advanced, then turning off the “Beta service updates” switch.
trans-unit.target: Faites-nous savoir si les problèmes persistent. Vous pouvez réinitialiser les mises à jour du service en ouvrant les Réglages, appuyez sur Avancés, puis désactivez le bouton « Mises à jour du service Beta ».
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert shown when a beta service update has finished installing, used on iOS

trans-unit.source: Let us know if you continue to have problems. You can reset service updates by opening the Preferences, clicking Advanced, then unchecking the “Beta service updates” box.
trans-unit.target: Faites-nous savoir si les problèmes persistent. Vous pouvez réinitialiser les mises à jour du service en cliquant sur Préférences, puis sur Avancés et en décochant la case « Mises à jour du service Beta ».
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert shown when a beta service update has finished installing, used on macOS

trans-unit.target: Mise à jour du service installée %@
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert shown when a beta service update has finished installing: Installed service update {version number}

trans-unit.source: You’ve reached the maximum number of active deliveries. To add more, archive or delete some of your current deliveries first.
trans-unit.target: Vous avez atteint le nombre maximum de livraisons actives. Pour en ajouter plus, archivez ou supprimez d’abord quelques-unes de vos livraisons actuelles.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the maximum number of active deliveries has been reached, and it will be necessary to archive or delete deliveries before adding more
Title for an alert explaining that the maximum number of active deliveries has been reached
Button to confirm that the database should be repaired

trans-unit.source: Deliveries will attempt to repair your database. This may help if some services are missing from the app, or if some of your deliveries have a generic appearance of black text on a white background.
trans-unit.target: Livraisons va tenter de réparer votre base de données. Cela peut aider si certains services manquent dans l’application, ou si quelques-unes de vos livraisons ont une apparence générique de texte noir sur fond blanc.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert confirming whether the database should be repaired, including examples of when this might be useful
Title for an alert confirming whether the database should be repaired
Button to quit and relaunch the app

trans-unit.source: This may be necessary after installing an update, or if the app was moved while it was open.
trans-unit.target: Ceci est nécessaire après l’installation d’une mise à jour, ou si l’application a été déplacée alors qu’elle était ouverte.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining why the app needs to restart
Title for an alert explaining that the app needs to restart
Button to reveal an item in Finder
Search filter for only active deliveries
Search filter for all deliveries
Search filter for only archived deliveries

trans-unit.source: This information was entered by the person that shared it with you.
trans-unit.target: Cette information a été entrée par la personne qui l'a partagée avec vous.
trans-unit.note: Notice shown when adding a shared delivery

trans-unit.target: Cette livraison ne peut pas être ajoutée
trans-unit.note: Title for an error shown when a shared delivery cannot be added
The name of the app

trans-unit.source: Deliveries is unable to refresh due to a problem with the current service update. Troubleshooting may be able to fix the problem automatically. If not, you can report the problem to Junecloud.
trans-unit.target: Livraisons ne peut pas être mise à jour en raison d’un problème avec la mise à jour du service en cours. Le dépannage peut permettre de résoudre le problème automatiquement. Dans le cas contraire, vous pouvez signaler le problème à Junecloud.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when there was a major error updating a delivery

trans-unit.source: Open the app to resume background updates.
trans-unit.target: Veuillez ouvrir l’application pour continuer les mises à jour en arrière-plan.
trans-unit.note: Notification that may appear when there's a problem with Background App Refresh
Title for the welcome pages window
Action to archive a delivery
Action to copy a delivery
Action to delete a delivery
Action to edit a delivery
Action to export a delivery
Action to mark a delivery as delivered
Action to open a delivery in the main app
Action to open the delivery in the default web browser: Open in {browser name}, for example 'Open in Safari'
Action to refresh a delivery
Action to sync and refresh all deliveries
Action to restore a delivery
Action to share a delivery
Action to open a menu where a package can be selected
Action to open a menu where a package can be selected
Action to sign in to an account
Action to sign in to an account, used in a menu on macOS
Action to open a view with suggestions on how to fix a problem
Action to troubleshoot a delivery
Action to troubleshoot a delivery, used in a menu on macOS
Action to view a delivery's tracking information in a web browser
Short indicator used when a delivery has more than one package: {selected number} of {total number}, for example '1 of 3' or '1/3'
Separator for a list of items, for example: 'Running Shoes, AirPods, Charger'
Format used for the item name when there is more than one package: '{item name}: {package name}'

trans-unit.source: Shared with Deliveries for %@, available on the App Store
trans-unit.target: Partagé avec Livraisons pour %@, disponible sur l’App Store
trans-unit.note: Message included when sharing a delivery, explaining where the shared content came from
Title used when sharing a delivery: Delivery from {service name}, for example 'Delivery from UPS'
Title used when sharing multiple deliveries: {number} deliveries, for example '3 deliveries'
Title used when sharing multiple deliveries from a single shipping company: {number} deliveries from {service name}, for example '3 deliveries from UPS'
Generic title used when sharing a delivery that does not have a name
Generic title used when sharing deliveries

trans-unit.source: This file contains %@ deliveries. The first 50 are shown.
trans-unit.target: Ce fichier contient %@ livraisons. Les 50 premières sont affichées.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that a file contains more deliveries than the preview can show: This file contains {number} deliveries. The first 50 are shown.
“{message name}” from {email address}
A person whose name is not known
A web page or message without a title
“{web page title}”
Title used for a delivery that does not have an item name
Short string indicating an update is in progress
Short message indicating that a service is being contacted: Contacting {service name}…, for example 'Contacting UPS…'
Short message indicating an item has been delivered
Short message indicating the date an item was delivered: Delivered {day}, for example 'Delivered Today' or 'Delivered June 10'
Short indicator that a delivery has an error

trans-unit.source: Make sure the information you entered is correct, or check back later. It may take a day or two until tracking information is available.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que les informations que vous avez saisies sont correctes, ou vérifiez-les plus tard. Cela peut prendre un jour ou deux avant que les informations de suivi ne soient disponibles.
trans-unit.note: Error message used when it is not known whether the tracking number is valid. It's possible the settings may be wrong, or it may be that the tracking system does not have any information yet.
Short message explaining the last update failed, due to an internet connection error
More information explaining what to do about an internet connection error

trans-unit.source: Make sure the information you entered is correct. It’s possible the number is incorrect or the wrong service was selected.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que les informations saisies sont correctes. Il est possible que le numéro ne soit pas correct ou que le mauvais service a été sélectionné.
trans-unit.note: Error message used when the tracking number is not valid or some other setting is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: Tracking information is not currently available.
trans-unit.target: Les informations de suivi ne sont pas disponibles actuellement.
trans-unit.note: Error message used when a delivery previously updated successfully, but tracking information is no longer available. Most likely this is a temporary problem that will resolve itself later.
Short message indicating that tracking information could not be found

trans-unit.source: This shipment can only be viewed online.
trans-unit.target: Cet envoi ne peut être consulté qu’en ligne.
trans-unit.note: Short message explaining that information is only available in a web view
Short message explaining that it's necessary to sign in to an account

trans-unit.source: Sign in to update this delivery.
trans-unit.target: Connectez-vous pour mettre à jour cette livraison.
trans-unit.note: More information explaining what to do about a sign in error
Short message indicating that a subscription is required

trans-unit.target: Abonnez-vous pour mettre à jour cette expédition.
trans-unit.note: Error message used to explain that the delivery cannot be updated without an active subscription

trans-unit.source: This service is not recognized by this version of Deliveries.
trans-unit.target: Ce service n’est pas reconnu par cette version de Livraisons.
trans-unit.note: Message used for an unknown error, usually because the delivery was created in a newer version of the app

trans-unit.target: Ce service n’est pas pris en charge.
trans-unit.note: Short message explaining that a service is no longer supported

trans-unit.source: Tracking information for this shipment cannot be shown directly in Deliveries.
trans-unit.target: Les informations de suivi de cet envoi ne peuvent pas être affichées dans Livraisons.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that more information cannot be shown in the app because the shipping company does not allow it

trans-unit.source: The tracking number you entered seems to be valid, so check back later. It may take a day or two until tracking information is available.
trans-unit.target: Le numéro de suivi saisi semble être valide, veuillez le vérifier plus tard. Cela peut prendre un jour ou deux avant que les informations de suivi ne soient disponibles.
trans-unit.note: Error message used when the tracking number appears to be valid. Most likely the settings are correct, but the tracking system does not have any information yet.
Short message indicating the number of days until an item is expected to be delivered: Delivered in {number of days}, for example 'Delivered in 1 day' or 'Delivered in 10 days'
Short message indicating the number of days until an item is expected to be shipped: Shipped in {number of days}, for example 'Shipped in 1 day' or 'Shipped in 10 days'
Short message indicating the date an item is expected to be delivered by: Delivered by {day}, for example 'Delivered by Tomorrow' or 'Delivered by June 10'
Short message indicating the date an item is expected to be shipped by: Shipped by {day}, for example 'Shipped by Tomorrow' or 'Shipped by June 10'
Short message indicating the expected delivery date is unknown
Very short message indicating the expected delivery date is unknown, used when space is very limited
Short message indicating no more information is available
Short message explaining when the last refresh was. 'Refreshed {date}', for example 'Refreshed a moment ago' or 'Refreshed 3 minutes ago'
Short message explaining the data has never been updated

trans-unit.source: This information may be out of date.
trans-unit.note: Message indicating that the information may not be up to date
Short message explaining when the status was updated. 'Status updated {date}, for example 'Status updated Today' or 'Status updated June 10'

trans-unit.source: Drag this pin to the correct location
trans-unit.target: Faites glisser l’epingle vers le bon endroit
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that the map pin can be moved to adjust the location
Short message shown when a location cannot be found due to an internet connection error
Format used to show map location errors: '{location name}: {error message}'

trans-unit.source: This location could not be found
trans-unit.target: Le lieu indiqué n’a pas été localisé
trans-unit.note: Short message shown when a location cannot be found on the map
Button used to confirm that the location should be reset

trans-unit.source: This location was set manually. Tap and hold the pin to adjust it further, or tap “Reset Location” to move it back.
trans-unit.target: L’emplacement a été défini manuellement. Touchez et maintenez le répére pour l’ajuster, ou touchez « Réinitialiser localisation » pour le remettre en place.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the location was manually adjusted, on iOS

trans-unit.source: This location was set manually. Drag the pin to adjust it further, or click “Reset Location” to move it back.
trans-unit.target: L’emplacement a été défini manuellement. Faites glisser l’épingle pour l’ajuster plus précisément, ou touchez « Réinitialiser localisation » pour la remettre en place.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert explaining that the location was manually adjusted, on macOS
Title for an alert confirming the location should be reset
Button that can be used to place a pin on the map for a location that could not be found
Short message shown when the location is unknown
Title for a button to add a new a contact
Button to copy information to the clipboard
Button for an alert

trans-unit.source: Shipments sent to your forwarding address will no longer be added to your account. If you turn it back on later, you’ll get a new address.
trans-unit.target: Les envois expédiés à votre adresse de suivi ne seront plus ajoutés à votre compte. Si vous le réactivez plus tard, vous aurez une nouvelle adresse.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert
Title for an alert
Button to add contact information to the address book

trans-unit.source: Mail to Deliveries allows you to forward emails with tracking information to add them to Deliveries. Your forwarding address is linked to your Junecloud account, so messages sent from any email address will be added to your account.
trans-unit.target: Mail vers Livraisons vous permet de transférer des courriels avec des informations de suivi afin de les ajouter à Livraisons. Votre adresse de suivi est liée à votre compte Junecloud, ainsi tous les messages envoyés depuis toute adresse électronique seront ajoutés à votre compte.
trans-unit.note: Description of how the Mail to Deliveries feature works
Message for an alert, explaining how to update Contacts permission
Message for an alert, explaining how to update Contacts permission

trans-unit.source: Tap Open Settings and make sure Contacts is on.
trans-unit.target: Appuyez sur Ouvrir Réglages et assurez-vous que Contacts est activé.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert, explaining how to update Contacts permission, on iOS

trans-unit.source: Click “Open System Preferences” to open the Security & Privacy pane of System Preferences. Select the Privacy tab, then select Contacts. Find Deliveries in the list, and make sure the box next to it is checked.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur « Ouvrir les préférences système » afin d’ouvrir le panneau Sécurité et confidentialité des préférences système. Sélectionnez l’onglet Confidentialité, puis Contacts. Cherchez Livraisons dans la liste et assurez-vous que la case à côté est cochée.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert, explaining how to update Contacts permission, on macOS

trans-unit.source: Deliveries needs permission to access your contacts
trans-unit.target: Livraisons demande une autorisation d’accès à vos contacts
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert

trans-unit.source: When you’re entering an address in Mail, start typing “%@” and then select the address.
trans-unit.target: Quand vous saisissez une adresse dans Mail, commencez par écrire « %@ » puis sélectionnez l’adresse.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert. %@ will be replaced with the name of the contact, for example “Deliveries”

trans-unit.source: “%@” has been added to your contacts
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert. %@ will be replaced with the name of the contact, for example “Deliveries”

trans-unit.target: Votre contact « %@ » a été mis à jour
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert. %@ will be replaced with the name of the contact, for example “Deliveries”
Name for a feature that allows forwarding an email message to add it to the Deliveries app
Title for a button to update a contact

trans-unit.source: Would you like to update the email address of your contact “%@”, or add a new contact?
trans-unit.target: Voulez-vous mettre à jour l’adresse e-mail de votre contact « %@ » ou ajouter un nouveau contact ?
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert. %@ will be replaced with the name of a contact, for example “Deliveries”

trans-unit.source: You already have a contact with a Mail to Deliveries address
trans-unit.target: Vous avez déjà un contact avec une adresse Mail vers Livraisons
trans-unit.note: Title for an alert
Menu item to close the current window
Menu item to export an object

Menu item used to export the selected objects (rather than exporting all objects)

Generic label used for a setting of an unknown type
Short label for a web site address
Name of a shipping service
Name of a shipping service
Title for advanced settings view
Label for a checkbox that enables the app to run in the background, used on macOS

trans-unit.source: When enabled, Deliveries Express will update and show notifications even if you quit the app.
trans-unit.target: Lorsqu’il est activé, Livraisons Express se met à jour et affiche les notifications même si vous quittez l’application.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining what will happen when background updates are enabled, used on macOS

trans-unit.source: Beta service updates let you try fixes for problems while they’re still being tested. In some cases they may cause unexpected problems.
trans-unit.target: Les mises à jour de service Beta vous permettent d’essayer des solutions pour des problèmes alors qu’elles sont encore en test. Dans certains cas, cela peut causer des problèmes inattendus.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining why beta service updates may be useful

trans-unit.target: Mises à jour de service Beta
trans-unit.note: Label for a setting that determines whether beta service updates will be installed

trans-unit.source: Beta service updates are no longer available for this version of Deliveries.
trans-unit.target: Les mises à jour de service Beta ne sont plus disponibles pour cette version de Livraisons.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining that beta service updates are not available for this version of the app

trans-unit.source: Deliveries needs to access your calendars to add estimated delivery dates to them. Tap Open Settings, then tap Privacy, and make sure Calendars is on.
trans-unit.target: Livraisons doit avoir accès à vos calendriers pour y ajouter les dates de livraisons estimées. Appuyez sur Ouvrir les réglages, puis Confidentialité et assurez-vous que les calendriers sont activés.
trans-unit.note: Error message explaining that Deliveries needs access to the user's calendars in order to enable the setting to add events to a calendar automatically
Label for a setting to automatically add events to a calendar, used on iOS
Label for a setting to automatically add events to a calendar, used on macOS
Button to allow the app permission to acccess the clipboard
Button to tell the app to ask for permission next time it wants to access the clipboard
Button to deny the app permission to acccess the clipboard

trans-unit.source: Deliveries can check your clipboard for tracking information and help you quickly add new deliveries. These checks happen on your device. Your clipboard data is not sent anywhere.
trans-unit.target: Livraisons peut chercher des informations de suivi dans votre presse-papier et vous aider à ajouter rapidement de nouvelles livraisons. Ces recherches se déroulent sur votre appareil. Les données de votre presse-papier ne sont envoyées nulle part.
trans-unit.note: Message for an alert asking for permission to check the clipboard for tracking information
Title for a setting that determines whether the app automatically detects tracking information on the clipboard

trans-unit.source: Show Deliveries in the menu bar
trans-unit.note: Label for a checkbox that shows the app in the menu bar, used on macOS

trans-unit.source: Background App Refresh is required for notifications. Tap Open Settings and make sure Background App Refresh is on.
trans-unit.target: L’actualisation en arrière-plan est nécessaire pour avoir accès aux notifications. Appuyez sur Ouvrir les réglages et assurez-vous que l’actualisation en arrière-plan est activée.
trans-unit.note: Message at the bottom of the Notifications view explaining that Background App Refresh is currently off and must be enabled
Label for the setting to enable background notifications

trans-unit.source: Tap Open Settings to adjust notification options, including sounds and badges.
trans-unit.target: Appuyez sur Ouvrir réglages pour ajuster les options de notifications, y compris les sons et badges.
trans-unit.note: Message at the bottom of the Notifications view explaining that additional options are available in the Settings app

trans-unit.source: Deliveries needs your permission to display notifications. Tap Open Settings, then tap Notifications, and make sure Allow Notifications is on.
trans-unit.target: Livraisons demande l’autorisation d’afficher les notifications. Appuyez sur Ouvrir Réglages, puis sur Notifications, et assurez-vous que l’option Autoriser les notifications est activée.
trans-unit.note: Message at the bottom of the Notifications view explaining that the app does not have permission to show notifications
Title for the notification settings view

trans-unit.target: Mise à jour du service installée :
trans-unit.note: Label indicating the service update number that is currently installed
Sort setting value: items are ordered by delivery date
Label for sorting options, used on iOS
Label for sorting options, used on macOS
Sort setting value: items are ordered by when the status last changed
Sort setting value: items are ordered manually
Title for a view related to beta access

trans-unit.source: To subscribe, open Deliveries, tap the Settings icon, then tap Subscription.
trans-unit.target: Pour vous abonner, ouvrez Livraisons, appuyez sur l’icône Réglages, puis sur Abonnement.
trans-unit.note: Brief explanation of how to open the app and find the Subscription view on iOS. This message appears in the Share extension when there's not an active subscription.

trans-unit.source: Track your packages in one place
trans-unit.target: Suivez tous vos colis au même endroit
trans-unit.note: Item in a list of subscription features

trans-unit.source: Add deliveries by forwarding an email with Junecloud sync
trans-unit.target: Ajoutez les livraisons via le transfert de mail avec Junecloud sync
trans-unit.note: Item in a list of subscription features

trans-unit.source: Quickly add shipments from web sites, emails, barcodes, and more
trans-unit.target: Ajoutez des envois à partir de sites web, de courriels, de codes-barres, etc.
trans-unit.note: Item in a list of subscription features
Item in a list of subscription features

trans-unit.source: Automatically add delivery dates to your calendar
trans-unit.target: Ajoutez automatiquement les dates de livraison dans votre calendrier
trans-unit.note: Item in a list of subscription features

trans-unit.source: Edit deliveries from any web browser with Junecloud sync
trans-unit.target: Modifier les livraisons depuis tout navigateur web avec la synchronisation Junecloud
trans-unit.note: Item in a list of subscription features

trans-unit.source: Your subscription will renew automatically. You can cancel at any time. Shipping services may be added or removed at any time, and Junecloud LLC makes no guarantees about the availability of a particular service. For more information see our [Terms of Service](deliveries://legal/terms) and [Privacy Policy](deliveries://legal/privacy).
trans-unit.target: Votre abonnement sera renouvelé automatiquement. Vous pouvez l’annuler à tout moment. Les services de suivi peuvent être ajoutés ou supprimés à tout moment, et Junecloud LLC ne donne aucune garantie quant à la disponibilité d’un service particulier. Pour plus d’informations, consultez nos [Conditions d’utilisation](deliveries://legal/terms) et [Politique de confidentialité](deliveries://legal/privacy).
trans-unit.note: Details at the bottom of the subscription view. Text in brackets will be automatically converted to links using Markdown formatting.

trans-unit.source: Subscribe to unlock all the features of Deliveries for iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and Mac.
trans-unit.target: Abonnez-vous afin de déverrouiller toutes les fonctionnalités de Livraisons pour iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch et Mac.
trans-unit.note: Subscribe message

trans-unit.source: Since you previously purchased Deliveries, you can continue to use most features from earlier versions, and many new ones.
trans-unit.target: Comme vous avez acheté Livraisons par le passé, vous pouvez continuer à utiliser la plupart des fonctionnalités des versions plus anciennes, ainsi que de nombreuses nouveautés.
trans-unit.note: Subscribe legacy message
Title for a view where a subscription can be purchased
Subscription thank you message

trans-unit.source: Thank you for being a beta tester.
trans-unit.note: Thank you message for beta testers

trans-unit.source: We were unable to verify your subscription status. Since this was our mistake, you’ve been given a temporary subscription for a short time while we sort out the problem.
trans-unit.target: Nous n’avons pas pu vérifier le statut de votre abonnement. Cette erreur étant la nôtre, un abonnement temporaire vous a été offert pour une courte période pendant la résolution du problème.
trans-unit.note: In some cases a temporary subscription may be granted if there's an error checking the subscription status. This is a message shown to explain what happened.

trans-unit.source:
Deliveries is changing to a subscription service. Since you previously purchased the app, most of the features you’re used to will remain unlocked. You have also been given a complimentary subscription based on your purchase date.
When your complimentary subscription expires, you’ll need to pay for a subscription to use Junecloud sync. We also plan to add new features in the future that will require a subscription. If you decide not to purchase a subscription, you’ll still be able to add new deliveries, use iCloud sync, and more.
trans-unit.target:
Livraisons passe à un service d’abonnement. Étant donné que vous avez précédemment acheté l’application, la plupart des fonctionnalités utilisées resteront accessibles. Un abonnement supplémentaire vous a également été offert suivant votre date d’achat.
À la fin de l’abonnement offert, l’utilisation de Junecloud sync sera payante. Nous envisageons également d’ajouter de nouvelles fonctionnalités nécessitant un abonnement. Même si vous décidez de ne pas souscrire d’abonnement, vous pourrez toujours ajouter de nouvelles livraisons, utiliser iCloud sync, et plus encore.
trans-unit.note: Subscription thank you message for legacy purchases
Legacy subscription name
Monthly subscription name
Yearly subscription name
In some cases a temporary subscription may be granted if there's an error checking the subscription status. This is the name used for that type of subscription.
Legacy subscription name

trans-unit.source: The problem was most likely a temporary issue with the shipping service, or something we fixed in the latest service update.
trans-unit.target: Il semble que le problème soit dû à un problème temporaire du service de livraison, ou à un problème résolu lors de la dernière mise à jour du service.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when troubleshooting is complete, and the problem appears to have been fixed

trans-unit.source: It looks like this problem was fixed in the latest service update.
trans-unit.target: Il semble que le problème ait été résolu dans la dernière mise à jour du service.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when troubleshooting is complete, and the problem was fixed by downloading a new service update
Title for a view when troubleshooting is complete
A generic error message used when no other information is available
Title for a view when a troubleshooting report could not be sent

trans-unit.source: If there’s a problem updating this delivery, troubleshooting may be able to fix it. If not, you can report the problem to Junecloud.
trans-unit.target: S’il y a un problème de mise à jour concernant la livraison, le service de dépannage pourra peut-être le résoudre. Sinon, vous pouvez signaler le problème à Junecloud.
trans-unit.note: Message explaining what the troubleshooting process does
Short message shown when troubleshooting is currently in progress
Short message shown when a troubleshooting report is being sent

trans-unit.source: Review the information below before you send it. Select Comments to add additional information. In some cases personal information may be sent—select Logs to view and edit that information if you prefer. Your data will be sent securely via HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: Vérifiez les informations ci-dessous avant de les envoyer. Sélectionnez Commentaires pour ajouter des informations supplémentaires. Dans certains cas, des informations personnelles peuvent être envoyées - sélectionnez Registres pour afficher et modifier les informations si vous le souhaitez. Vos données seront transmises en toute sécurité via HTTPS.
trans-unit.note: Message shown above a list of all the troubleshooting report data that has been collected
Title for a view showing a troubleshooting report
Button to confirm results are correct
Short message asking whether the troubleshooting results are correct
Button to reject incorrect results
Button to send a troubleshooting report

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your report. We’ll look into the problem and do our best to get it fixed.
trans-unit.target: Merci pour votre rapport. Nous allons nous pencher sur le problème et faire de notre mieux pour le résoudre.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when a troubleshooting report is successfully sent
Message shown when a report is successfully sent. This is used for informational reports rather than reports of a problem.
Title for a view when a report is successfully sent
Title for a view used for troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: Validation failed due to a database error.
trans-unit.target: Échec de la validation en raison d’une erreur de la base de données.
trans-unit.note: Error message when the delivery settings cannot be validated due to a database error

trans-unit.target: Ce service n’est pas pris en charge.
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to save a delivery from a service that is not supported

trans-unit.target: Saisissez un numéro de commande valide.
trans-unit.note: Error message when the order number that was entered is invalid

trans-unit.source: Enter an order number, not a tracking number.
trans-unit.target: Saisissez un numéro de commande, et non pas un numéro de suivi.
trans-unit.note: Error message when an order number is required, but it seems like a tracking number was entered instead

trans-unit.target: Saisissez un numéro de suivi valide.
trans-unit.note: Error message when the tracking number that was entered is invalid
Error message when the web site address that was entered is invalid

trans-unit.source: Enter a link to a “Track Package” page on Amazon.
trans-unit.target: Ajoutez un lien vers la page « Suivre votre commande » sur Amazon.
trans-unit.note: Error message when a link to an Amazon tracking page is missing or invalid
Error message when a consignment number (a specific type of tracking number) is missing
Error message when an email address is missing
Generic error message when one or more settings are missing
Error message when an order number is missing
Error message when a postal code (or zip code) is missing
Error message when a reference number (a specific type of tracking number) is missing
Error message when a tracking number is missing

trans-unit.source: Check on your next expected package, or one you select. The medium size includes a summary of other upcoming deliveries.
trans-unit.target: Vérifiez le statut du prochain colis à arriver, ou un que vous avez sélectionné. La taille moyenne inclut un résumé d'autres livraisons à venir.
trans-unit.note: Description of a widget that shows upcoming deliveries
Title for a widget that shows upcoming deliveries
Title for a section that shows a list of additional upcoming packages

trans-unit.source: Tap to learn how to add our new widget on iOS 14 or later.
trans-unit.target: Touchez pour savoir comment ajouter notre nouveau widget sur iOS14 ou toute version ultérieure.
trans-unit.note: Message that opens a link explaining how to add widgets on iOS 14 or later
Description of a widget that shows upcoming deliveries
Title for a widget that shows upcoming deliveries
Title for a section that shows a list of additional upcoming packages
